vendor_name: Oceanica Resort Panglao (formerly South Palms Resort Panglao) LPC
title: Top-Rated Panglao Tropical Island Retreat with Private Beach
description:
Tropical paradise means white sandy beaches, swaying palm trees, bright blue waters, and sunset cocktails and you’ll find all this and more at Oceanica Resort Panglao. It's not hard to see why this resort is ranked within the top 10% of all properties on Tripadvisor with its warm Bohol hospitality and pristine private stretch of beach.

Days stretch long here: swim in the glorious pool, indulge in a pampering treatment at Zenses The Spa, feast on fresh seafood at Oceanica Seafood Restaurant, or lay a towel along Bohol Beach’s sugar-fine sand and while away an afternoon basking in the sun. Marine life is in abundance around Panglao Island, so don your snorkel or dive gear and head out for a glimpse into this marine wonderland, or for those seeking the buzzing nightlife, Alona Beach is brimming with blissed-out beach bars, clubs, live music venues and restaurants.
offer_address: Brgy, Bolod, Panglao Island Bohol 6340 Philippines

vendor_name: South Palms Resort and Spa Panglao
title: Tropical Beachfront Panglao Resort with Spa, Pool & Three Restaurants
description:
Escape to the idyllic island of Panglao, home to the stunning South Palms Resort and Spa Panglao - MGallery Collection. This luxurious retreat offers a tranquil oasis, set amidst swaying palm trees and the shimmering waters of the Bohol Sea. Unwind in the resort's infinity pool, indulge in rejuvenating treatments at Panglao Spa, or savour a meal at one of the three onsite restaurants.

Explore the vibrant local culture with a visit to the nearby Hinagdanan Cave, a naturally lit cavern known for its stunning stalactite formations. Take advantage of the resort's facilities and scuba dive, snorkel, water ski and kayak at nearby colourful reefs that are teeming with diverse sea life.
location_description: South Palms Resort and Spa Panglao - MGallery Collection
offer_address: Barangay Tawala, Panglao Island, Bohol Province, Panglao 6340, Philippines
